p: The yield of spray-dried powders varied from 44.19% ± 0.33% to 66.97% ± 0.98% and was the highest when the composition was 0.5 g of sodium caseinate, 7 g of skim milk, 12 g of resistant-maltodextrin, and 0.5 g of beta-cyclodextrin. The lowest yield was obtained when composition of wall materials was 1 g of sodium caseinate, 8.13 g of skim milk, 10.13 g of resistant-maltodextrin, and 0.75 g of beta-cyclodextrin.
